title: Living With a Girl I Just Met
description: Despite submitting countless job applications, he was never accepted for a single position. Moreover, his girlfriend broke up with him. After searching through forums for part-time jobs, he accepted an offer to live in a one-room apartment in exchange for receiving a large sum of money. There, he encountered a girl in the same situation as him... They were told the large sum of money would be deposited into their accountsâ€”on the condition that they live together, but...!!
author: Studio Moon
